notes_phase5: Core trend level; used as base feature in most models.
Normalized range location for top/bottom context.
Discretized RSI states; thresholds configurable in admin.
Event when RSI crosses below oversold threshold; used for entry/exit logic.
Event when RSI crosses above overbought threshold.
Realized volatility over 20-bar window, typically daily.
Baseline participation metric; zero if missing or no trading.
Cumulative signed volume; useful with trend context.
Marks local swing highs; used in structure and swing-based logic.

notes_phase5: Distance in price units or %; sentinel (e.g., large number) if no zone exists.

feature_name: Distance to nearest strong resistance zone

notes_phase5: Basic candle feature; shows rejection from above.
Basic candle feature; shows rejection from below.
Normalized close location, used in many candle rules.
Canonical trend state; major context feature.
Composite quality score; enabled where fundamentals are available and clean.
How much of configured risk budgets are used; >1 implies breach.
Event fired when utilization exceeds configured threshold.
Dense vector feature; stored as JSON or external embedding store; optional in v1.
